document.heading: New Hires Police Officers, Fire Fighters, and Teachers Pension Modification Amendment Act of 1996

history.narrative: Law 11-218, the “New Hires Police Officers, Fire Fighters, and Teachers Pension Modification Amendment Act of 1996,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 11-316. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 3, 1996, and October 1, 1996, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 18, 1996, it was assigned Act No. 11-432 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 11-218 became effective on April 9, 1997.
